headline: Amazon.com Announces Fourth Quarter Results
summary: SEATTLE, February 05, 2026--Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) today announced financial results for its fourth quarter ended December 31, 2025.

headline: Visa UnionPay Deal Extends China Reach As Shares Flagged Undervalued
summary: Visa (NYSE:V) has announced a new partnership with UnionPay International to power cross border payments into mainland China via Visa Direct. The tie up enables real time payments and remittances to reach over 95% of UnionPay International debit cardholders in China. The move targets growing demand for instant payouts for freelancers, contractors, and families sending money into China. Visa, trading at $329.95 as of the last close, is positioned at the center of global electronic payments,...

headline: Visa Introduces Visa & Main, A New Platform to Accelerate Small Business Growth Across the U.S.
summary: SAN FRANCISCO & ATLANTA, February 05, 2026--Visa unveils Visa & Main, giving small businesses expanded access to flexible financing, tools to reach more customers, and essentials to grow.

headline: B2B Payments Global Report 2025: A 15.88 Trillion Market by 2030 from $11.69 Trillion in 2024 with Citi TTS, JP Morgan, HSBC Global, Visa, and Mastercard Accounting for 29.2% Share
summary: Open Banking, AI/ML, and digital finance platforms are transforming B2B payments. Opportunities lie in adopting real-time, cross-border solutions driven by SMEs, enhanced security, regulatory changes, and new tech integration. North America, Europe lead in maturity; Asia-Pacific and Latin America are growth hotspots.Dublin, Feb. 05, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "B2B Payments Market, Global, 2024-2030" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering. headline: Visa, Amex vie for small businesses
summary: The card networks are each pitching new services to mom-and-pop stores, including financing options as well as tools for expense management and fraud mitigation.

headline: 2 Mega-Cap Stocks to Own for Decades and 1 We Avoid
summary: "Too big to fail" is how we would describe the megacap stocks in this article today. While they will likely stand the test of time, it’s not all sunshine and rainbows as their scale can limit their ability to find new sources of growth.

raw.headline: 2 Mega-Cap Stocks to Own for Decades and 1 We Avoid

headline: Visa Inc. (V): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Visa Inc. on Quality Value Investing’s Substack by David J. Waldron. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on V. Visa Inc.’s share was trading at $326.98 as of January 28th. V’s trailing and forward P/E were 31.89 and 25.38 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Visa Inc. operates as a payment technology […]
